annotation.summary: The ability allows a character to draw enemy focus by using heavy weapons, protecting allies by absorbing attacks.

annotation.action_economy: Not specified; descriptive flavor text only.

annotation.summary: This ability allows a character to reload a ranged weapon more efficiently, reducing the reload cost by 1 and enabling reloading without needing a free hand.
annotation.action_economy: Interact action (modified to not require a free hand)
